name: Survive by Night
description:
Escape the infested town using a variety of weapons you find along the way!   The game has two distinct phases:

Day:  The monsters are statues that can't move or be hurt (don't waste your ammo!)

Night:  The monsters come to life, and YOU CAN'T MOVE, only shoot.  Hope you picked a good corner to stop in!  Watch your back!

Make it to the green area at the end of the road to Escape!

Controls: 

WASD - movement

Left mouse - fire

Right mouse - iron sights

~/1/2/3 - switch between melee/pistol/m16/shotgun.

E - Pick up items

Made using UFPS and other Unity assets
